About the Office of the Auditor General:
The OAG audits federal government departments and agencies; Crown corporations; the governments of Nunavut, Yukon, and the Northwest Territories; and territorial corporations and agencies.
Financial audits answer whether the annual financial statements of Crown corporations, the federal and territorial governments, and other organizations are presented fairly and whether these entities are complying with their legislative authorities. Performance audits answer whether programs are being run with due regard for economy, efficiency and environmental impacts and if the government have the means in place to measure the effectiveness of its programs.
